mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lessons (class_id, subject_id, teacher_id, classroom_id, group_id, day_of_week, lesson_number) VALUES (#{classId}, #{subjectId}, #{teacherId}, #{classroomId}, #{groupId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dayOfWeek}, #{lessonNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE lessons SET class_id = #{classId}, subject_id = #{subjectId}, teacher_id = #{teacherId}, classroom_id = #{classroomId}, group_id = #{groupId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, day_of_week = #{dayOfWeek}, lesson_number = #{lessonNumber} WHERE id = #{id}
